entry.title: Wednesday: Freezing rain or rain. High plus 1.
entry.summary: Freezing rain changing to rain this afternoon. Risk of a thunderstorm early this afternoon. Risk of freezing rain and a thunderstorm late this afternoon. Wind east 20 km/h gusting to 40. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 8 this morning. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 11:39 AM EDT Wednesday 5 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Showers. Low minus 1.
